metadata.title: CVE-2023-52575 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:x86/srso: Fix SBPB enablement for spec_rstack_overflow=off If the user hasrequested no SRSO mitigation, other mitigations can use the lighter-weightSBPB instead of IBPB.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
